brief-grit real estate income group says ‍explores potential listing on lse

text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Grit Real Estate Income Group Ltd :
* ‍EXPLORING A POTENTIAL PREMIUM LISTING ON MAIN MARKET OF LONDON STOCK EXCHANGE ​
* ‍GRIT WILL BE MEETING WITH EXISTING AND POTENTIAL STAKEHOLDERS IN FOLLOWING WEEKS TO DISCUSS POTENTIAL LSE LISTING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
